Serialized Form

  • Package mediatordesignpatternmba

    • Class mediatordesignpatternmba.MediatorGUI extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • mediator

          Mediator mediator
          mediator instantiate the mediator object so the GUI can communicate with the Mediator which is going to communicate with the concrete classes.

        • drones

          DroneConstruction drones
          drones object responsible for getting and setting the state of the drones.

        • jedi

          Jedi jedi
          jedi object responsible for getting and setting the state of the jedis.

        • robots

          RobotPressurizedRover robots
          robots object responsible for getting and setting the state of the robots.

        • scientists

          Scientist scientists
          scientists object responsible for getting and setting the state of the scientists.

        • commandButtons

          javax.swing.JButton[] commandButtons
          commandButtons represent the buttons that are handled with the Mediator.

        • messages

          javax.swing.JLabel messages
          messages is responsible for displaying the message from the mediator.

        • centralPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel centralPanel
          centralPanel this is where the image is placed.

        • southPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel southPanel
          southPanel here are placed the buttons and the label for the text.

        • westPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel westPanel
          westPanel here are placed the states of the jedi/drones/robots/scientist and the labels for the text.

        • northPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel northPanel
          northPanel here are placed the states of westPanel.

        • three

          int three
          three represent the number 3 and is used to access the third element from the buttons and the imageicons.

        • four

          int four
          four represent the number 4 and is used to access the fourth element from the buttons and the imageicons.

        • twentyfour

          int twentyfour
          twentyfour represent the number 24 and is used to set the font of the text.

        • droneStates

          javax.swing.JComboBox<E> droneStates
          droneStates a combo box for the states of the drones.

        • jediStates

          javax.swing.JComboBox<E> jediStates
          jediStates a combo box for the states of the jedis.

        • robotStates

          javax.swing.JComboBox<E> robotStates
          robotStates a combo box for the states of the robots.

        • scientistStates

          javax.swing.JComboBox<E> scientistStates
          scientistStates a combo box for the states of the scientist.
